resources.string: WRLD Android API Samples
WRLD Samples
obtain an api key by signing up at wrld3d.com and insert here
Embed a 3D map
How to embed a 3D map view in an Android App
Position a View on the map
Use a positioner to locate a View at a point on the map
Position a code-created View on the map
Position a code-created View on the map and use a positioner to locate it
Move the camera
Simple camera movement
Animate the camera
Move the camera with animation
Move the camera to an indoor map
Move the map camera to a point on an indoor map.
Animate the camera to an indoor map
Move the map camera with animation to a point on an indoor map.
Frame an area
Move the camera to frame an area
Query camera location and zoom
Obtain the current camera location and zoom level
Pick a point on the map
Obtain the coordinates of a point on the map that is tapped by the user
Enter and exit an indoor map
Entering and exiting an indoor map
Query the name of an indoor map
After entering an indoor map, display its name
Control indoor map floors
Move between indoor map floors
Animate indoor maps with a slider
Optional, beautiful user experience for controlling indoor maps
Add a marker
Display a marker on the map
Add a marker with a different icon
Display a marker on the map with a specific icon
Add a marker with an elevation
Display a marker on the map at a height above the ground
Add a marker with an altitude
Display a marker on the map at a height above sea level
Add an indoor marker
Display a marker on an indoor map
Change the title of a marker
Alter the text on a marker after adding to the map
Change the location of a marker
Alter the location of a marker after adding to the map
Select a marker
Get notified when the user taps on a marker
Change the draw order of markers
Configure and alter the draw order of markers. Draw order determines precedence when markers overlap
Map streaming completed notification
Receive notification that the loading of map resources for the initial scene has completed
Create a map view programmatically
Add a 3d map view configured with options in a dynamically created layout
Add a polygon
Display a polygon on the map
Add a polygon to an indoor map
Display a polygon inside an indoor map
Add a polygon with holes
Display a polygon with holes on the map
Add a polygon with elevation
Display a polygon on the map at a height above the ground
Add a polyline
Display a polyline on the map
Add a polyline to an indoor map
Display a polyline inside an indoor map
Add a heatmap
Display a heatmap on the map
Add a heatmap to an indoor map
Display a heatmap inside an indoor map
Add and interact with a heatmap
Display a heatmap on the map, with interactive controls
Add a prop to an indoor map
Display a prop inside an indoor map
Blue sphere with accuracy ring
Show an accuracy ring around blue sphere
Change the location of a blue sphere
Move the blue sphere to a different point on the map
Change the bearing of a blue sphere
Alter the bearing the blue sphere is facing
Change the elevation of a blue sphere
Display a blue sphere on the map at a height above the ground
Move the blue sphere indoors
Display a blue sphere inside an indoor map
Add a building highlight
Add a highlight for a building
Remove a building highlight
Remove a building highlight that was previously added to the map
Place objects on buildings
Query the altitude of a building in order to position a marker
Picking buildings
Highlight buildings by tapping on them
Query building information
Obtain information about a building at a location and place a marker above its centroid
Enable and disable labels
Enable and disable labels
Search for POIs
Use the POI service to find POIs on the map matching a certain query
Cancel a POI search
Cancel an ongoing search before it completes
"Load a Mapscene"
"Use the Mapscene service to load and apply a mapscene"
Find an outdoor route
Use the routing service to find a route between two places outdoors
Find an indoor route
Use the routing service to find a route inside a building
Find a multipart route
Use the routing service to find a route from inside one building to another
Cancel a routing query
Cancel a routing service query before it completes
Display a route
Display routes on the map using the RouteView widget
Change the style of a RouteView
Change the color and width of a RouteView dynamically
Draw markers along a route
Add markers to the map for each step of a route
Find the closest point on a Path
Retrieve information about the closest point on a Path to a given input point
Find the closest a point on a Route
Retrieve information about the closest point on a Route to a given input point
Precaching map data
Precache map data for future use
Cancel precaching map data
Cancel an operation to precache map data for future use
Change the theme manifest
Set an alternate display theme manifest
http://cdn-resources.wrld3d.com/mobile-themes-new/v1141/legacy/manifest.bin.gz
Highlighting indoor map entities
Use the buttons to toggle some indoor entity highlights
Picking indoor map entities
Tap on the meeting rooms and desks to highlight them
Query indoor map entity information
Obtain information about the entities within an indoor map
Query indoor map floor outline information
Obtain information about the outline for a floor in an indoor map
Indoor map loading notification
Obtain notification that an indoor map has been loaded or unloaded by the streaming system
http://cdn-resources.wrld3d.com/mobile-themes-new/v1451/ambientdark/manifest.bin.gz

Remove Entity Information
